name: Uta no☆Prince-sama♪ MUSIC 3
description:
'Uta no☆Prince-sama♪ MUSIC' (stylization of うたの☆プリンスさまっ♪MUSIC) is a rhythmic otome video game made for the PlayStation Vita on January 28th, 2016. It is the sixth entry to be made for the main series, and the third installment of the 'MUSIC' spin-off series: focusing more on rhythm-based gameplay, than a visual novel experience. There are, however, segments that feature mini scenarios in-between sessions. There is a limited edition of the game, which was part of a bundle.

Features:

• Customization of Performance Buttons ★NEW FEATURE★
• Combo Voice
• Touch Voice ★NEW FEATURE★
• Reward Scenes
• Customization
• Accessory Parts for the Idols ★NEW FEATURE★
• Memorial Stories
• Edo no Otono-sama ★NEW FEATURE★
• Play With Mascot Characters ★NEW FEATURE★
